nodes.text: Decision: Almas was a roleplaying-game adventure in year four of the Living Force campaign. It was the first adventure in the Decisions trilogy and was written by Ronald A. Heintz.

The heroes join with Strike Force Cularin, a military task force made up of units from the Galactic Republic, Cularin Militia and Thaereian military. The task force was dispatched to the Ando system, where it captures a Separatist ship and attacked a Separatist base. However, the heroes recovered a datacard which revealed that the Thaereians had secretly joined forces with the Separatists.
